duties_responsibilities.duty: Overseeing all engineering and technical aspects of assigned projects to assure accuracy and quality.
Supporting structural calculations and state-certified drawings.
Performing engineering calculations and providing ABM's and Work Orders.
Developing technical solutions to issues in a timely manner and providing AutoCAD conveyor layouts.
Reviewing and tracking project requirements, visiting job sites, and providing start-up assistance as required.
Training and monitoring engineering sub-contractors selected for the project.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in mechanical engineering and 5 plus years of automotive conveyor work experience, or a non-degreed with 5 plus years’ experience in automotive conveyor work.
